src_text: On Monday, Sara Danius, permanent secretary of the Nobel Committee for Literature at the Swedish Academy, publicly announced during a radio program on Sveriges Radio in Sweden the committee, unable to reach Bob Dylan directly about winning the 2016 Nobel Prize in Literature, had abandoned its efforts to reach him.
ref_text: Lolemba , Sara Danius , mlembi wokhazikika wa komiti ya Nobel ya zolembalemba ku Academy yaku Sweden, adalengeza pa pulogalamu yapa wailesi ya Sveriges , akulephera kuyakhulana ndi Bob Dylan zokhudza popambana kwake pa 2016 pa Mphoto ya Nobel ya Zolembalemba , ndipo asiya kuthekera kwawo kosakaya mkuluyu.
hyp_text: Modzi, Sara Danius, sekretari yopita pa Komiti yomwe imeneyo pa Nyimbo za Literature pa Akademi ya Swidi, anali kuwononga pa program ya radio pa Sveriges Radio ku Swidi, komiti ilipo kuthandizira pa Bob Dylan kwa kuwononga pa 2016 Nobel Prize pa Nyimbo za Literature, kudziwa kudziwa kutsogolo kwa kuwononga pake.

src_text: The outbreak has prompted the Indian government to undertake such measures as deployment of pig catchers in seriously affected areas, distributing thousands of mosquito curtains and spraying pesticides.
ref_text: Kuphulika kwa matenda kumeneku kwapangitsa boma la India kuti lichite zimenezi monga kuyika misampha m'malo omwe ali okhuzidwa kwambiri, kugawa zikwi zikwi za makatani amasikito audzudzu komaso kupopera mankhwala.
hyp_text: Dzina la mkangano ilipo pamodzi ndi kuwononga anthu a makolo ku mafika a ku chipatala cha ku chilungamo, kuwononga anthu a ku mafika a ku chipatala cha ku chilungamo, ndi kuwononga anthu a ku mafika a ku chipatala cha ku chilungamo.

src_text: He was also engaged in engraving banknotes for many countries, recent examples of his work including the Prime Ministerial portraits on the front of the new Canadian $5 and $100 bills.
ref_text: Ankagwiranso ntchito yopanga zifanifani za ndalama zamayiko ambiri, zitsanzo zaposachedwapa za ntchito yake ndizo zithunzi za Nduna Yayikulu kutsogolo kwa ndalama zaku Canada zomwe ndi $5 komaso $ 100.
hyp_text: Dziwa anu anali akuthandizira mabanka a ku maboma a ku mankhwala, ndi nthawi zonse zonse zikulu zomwe zinalekaniza mabanka a ku Canada, ndipo zikulu zomwe zinalekaniza mabanka a $5 ndi $100.

src_text: He was reportedly aged in his 20s. In a statement, Bieber said "[w]hile I was not present nor directly involved with this tragic accident, my thoughts and prayers are with the family of the victim."

hyp_text: Dziko lino lililidwa ku m'mwana wa 20. Ku statement, Bieber sanamizindikira: 'Ndipo kumodzi ndi kusiya ku chilango chino, ndipo ndikulibe ntchito ndi kuwonjezera m'mawa a m'phokera wa m'mwana wa wina'

src_text: I lost my sister and her friend, and on my way there were two disabled people in wheelchairs, people just jumping over and pushing them," Armand Versace said.
ref_text: “Ndataya mlongo wanga ndi nzake, ndipo ndikupita munjira munali anthu awiri aulumali amene amayenda pa zikuku , anthu anali kungowalumpha nkumawakankha,” anatelo a Amarnd Versace.
hyp_text: Dziwavira m'modzi ndi mwana wanga, ndipo pa njira yonse tikulidwa mwana wina wodziwa ndi m'modzi, ndi nthawi idale yonse takudziwa ndi abale akuwonjezera ndi akuluakulu.

src_text: It can be made very thin, and stuck onto other metal. It can be made so thin that it was sometimes used to decorate the hand-painted pictures in books called "illuminated manuscripts".
ref_text: Kakhoza kukonzedwa kukhala kopyapyala zedi, ndi kumata zitsulo zina. Kakhoza kukonzedwa kukhala kopyapyala zedi choncho nthawi zina kamagwiritsidwa ntchito kukongoletsa zithunzi zojambulidwa ndi manja m'mabuku otchedwa “illuminated manuscripts”.
hyp_text: Dziko lidziwa kuwala mwachidziwa, ndi kuyenda kuwala ku metal. Dziko lidziwa kuwala kwa zinthu zonse, ndipo pafupi pafupi pano tikwane kuwala kuwala ku mapiri a a msiko wa 'msaithiko wa nthawi zonse'.

src_text: The Three Kingdoms was one of the bloodiest eras in Ancient China’s history thousands of people died fighting to sit in the highest seat in the grand palace at Xi’an.
ref_text: Maufumu atatu amenewa, ndi amodzi awomwe adakhetsa mwazi mu mbiri yakale ya dziko la China pomwe anthu zikwizikwi adataya miyoyo pomenya nkhondo kuti akakhale pa mpando waukulu ku nyumba ya chifumu imene inali ku Xi'an.
hyp_text: Dziko la Moyo ndi m'modzi m'modzi mwa m'mabuku a Dziko la Malaŵi ku China a nthawi ya anthu a kuwonongedwa ku nyumba ya kubwino ku Xi'an.
